title: A highly durable catalyst system for hydrogen production from dimethyl ether
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00059E, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Robert Stöber, Franziska Seidl, Emanuel Hoffmann, Peter Wasserscheid, Patrick Schühle
This paper describes a highly stable and selective catalyst mixture of γ-Al2O3 and In2O3/ZrO2 for hydrogen production from dimethyl ether.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
